title: Msg
description: Msg is an anonymous messaging platform enabling users to send messages without revealing their identities, using secure authentication and AI-powered features.

title: Music Mastery
description: A comprehensive platform offering music courses, webinars, and expert insights. Features include interactive lessons, flexible learning, and community support.

title: Authify
description: A secure web app offering seamless user authentication, profile management, and email functionalities. It ensures smooth sign-ups, logins, and password recovery, with advanced protection for user data.

title: Blog
description: A responsive blogging platform built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring secure user authentication, dynamic post management, and efficient file storage using Appwrite.

title: StreamTube
description: A backend system for a YouTube-like platform, featuring user management, video and comment handling, playlist creation, and support for likes and subscriptions. Includes a health check endpoint for monitoring.

title: Qtify
description: Effortlessly navigate with a captivating hero and intuitive navbar. Explore top albums in a dynamic grid-carousel. Enjoy personalized music with genre filtering.

title: Qkart
description: Designed a secure shopping platform with robust authentication, dynamic cart, and streamlined checkout. The responsive design ensures consistency across devices, with real-time updates via REST API.
